channel.title: Blog on フロー Furo
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on フロー Furo

item.title: Moving to eclipse
item.description: We started to move the many parts of the furo project from theNorstroem to eclipse last month. This forced us to restructure the individual parts of furo. The restructuring definitely brings us some advantages for the project itself. For the consumers, the sharp separation of the involved components, a cleaner naming and improved documentation will give them a better view of the big picture. We kept the changes that you have to made as low as possible.
